item.title: Debug k8s applications on the fly
item.description: Introduction - Debug k8s applications on the fly Nowadays, the development of applications on kubernetes is something that any developer will surely use in their work.

item.title: Working with Microservices
item.description: During my professional career, I’ve been working with microservices for a long time, and I would like to share with you the experiences and knowledge that I’ve learnt working with them.
